channel.title: .:~->|Neopets FAQ:For people who don't know what neopets are, AND MORE!|<-~:
channel.description:
Q:[b]What is Neopets?[/b] A:Neopets is a game where we register a free account and play free games to gain neopoints (Money) and you get your own kind of computer pet which you have to feed and stuff, using the neopoints to buy food and other stuff for your "pet". Q:[b]Where can I register a account[/b] A: www.neopets.com [b][u]Q:Do I HAVE to feed my neopet?[/u][/b] A:Yes you do.Once you register it will show the stats of your neopets. These are mine.
Species: Buzz Health: 9 / 9 Mood: content Hunger: dying Age: 27 days Level: 1
You see Hunger? Well a neopet can die if you don't feed it,but you can get another one. [u][b]Q:Can I name my neopet.[/b][/u] A:Yes you can. Like a nickname. But you will have a username which is different from your nickname,and a password.But I forewarn you don't make a name like neopets suck or **** you,because they will let you use the name until you have to activate the account using your email and then they will say.Username DENIED. Its quite annoying because we have to go through a 10-20min account making steps and then at the end it says ACCOUNT DENIED!.

item.title: .:~->|Neopets FAQ:For people who don't know what neopets are, AND MORE!|<-~:
item.dc:creator: @moparsc4p3 moparsc4p3
item.description:
@moparsc4p3 wrote:

Q:What is Neopets?
A:Neopets is a game where we register a free account and play free games to gain neopoints (Money) and you get your own kind of computer pet which you have to feed and stuff, using the neopoints to buy food and other stuff for your “pet”.
Q:Where can I register a account
A: www.neopets.com
Q:Do I HAVE to feed my neopet?
A:Yes you do.Once you register it will show the stats of your neopets.
These are mine.

Species: Buzz
Health: 9 / 9
Mood: content
Hunger: dying
Age: 27 days
Level: 1

You see Hunger? Well a neopet can die if you don’t feed it,but you can get another one.
Q:Can I name my neopet.
A:Yes you can. Like a nickname. But you will have a username which is different from your nickname,and a password.But I forewarn you don’t make a name like neopets suck or **** you,because they will let you use the name until you have to activate the account using your email and then they will say.Username DENIED.
Its quite annoying because we have to go through a 10-20min account making steps and then at the end it says ACCOUNT DENIED!.

Read full topic
item.source: .:~->|Neopets FAQ:For people who don't know what neopets are, AND MORE!|<-~:
